lenders.occupational_info:
I work as a research & evaluation (monitoring) expert for a Philadelphia-based non-profit organization called Research for Better Schools. 

My main professional interests are in school improvement and sustainable human development, both in the USA and internationally (particularly in the field of education).

lenders.occupational_info: I have been a wife and mother, spinner, weaver, dyer, seamstress, knitter, embroiderer, potter, gardener,  cook/baker, watercolorist, calligrapher, home designer/builder, computer systems developer, naturopathic medical practitioner.

lenders.name: RupaMagic

lenders.occupational_info:
I love traveling and have seen first hand the radical difference between western excess and third world poverty.  I am thrilled that someone has figured out a way for us "little people" who may have only a few extra bucks in our pockets to help in a direct and tangible way.  

I work as a chef in a holistic healing center in the Redwoods of northern California.  Cooking is one of my great passions and I feel so blessed that I am able to do what I love for a living.

lenders.name: Marvin & Emma
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Larry

lenders.occupational_info: I am a theatrical actress. I like to perform powerful dramatic performances. I have performed at the Yale School of Drama in 2001. I also like to model. I enjoy public service and community service.

lenders.loan_because: I can. I get to feel good by doing good.

lenders.name: Gautam
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the tremendous benefits of microfinancing in the fight against poverty. This is a way of truly empowering small entreprenuers, and eventually throwing them in the ranks of the middle class.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: Life is kharmic

lenders.name: Rebecca Dunsdon
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see a world where everyone can access adequate resources to lead fulfilling lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a migrant centre that provides support to newly arrived migrants and refugees.  Currently, I work as a refugee settlement worker, helping individuals and families from refugee backgrounds to settle successfully in Australia.  I also work as a community development worker with minority ethnic groups from the Chin state of Burma and the Sudanese and Afghan communities in Melbourne to assess their needs and build their capacity to achieve their goals.

lenders.name: John Arundel
lenders.loan_because: It's fun!

lenders.name: Ron

lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for the sandwich chain, Subway. I go around to different Subway restaurants and help the owners improve their businesses.

I think that we have obligation to help who needs.
We do not know the future, and can happen that in the future we also need help. And if everybody helps each others, the world will be better.

lenders.name: Boitumelo
lenders.occupational_info: Dumela borra le boma! Greetings from Botswana, Africa. My name is Boitumelo Pule, and I am a 45 year old single woman living in the small rural village of Machaneng. I have 4 children, the eldest being 25 and the youngest being 14. Education and personal development have always been a priority in our family. My eldest sons have all completed either university or technical schools, while my youngest son recently received eight academic and extra curricular awards at his secondary school. While raising four talented yet charmingly adventurous sons, I made time to run my own small business. For the past few years I have been using my own personal funds to sell second hand clothes to the people in surrounding villages. While the demand for affordable, high quality clothing in a relatively impoverished area such as ours is consistent, the overhead for procuring and vending these items often leaves my profitless. My goal is to expand my business, buy my products in bulk, and service my clients with greater efficiency and quality. The growing social climate in Botswana is one of self sufficiency and creative innovation. I hope my cooperation with the American people will foster a strong and lucrative relationship that will advance both me and my community members. Thank you for your time and support!

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I care. This is a little way I can support my sisters and brothers around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently I'm enrolled at university and study Global Studies with a minor in TESOL

lenders.name: Toby
lenders.loan_because: Helping people get out of poverty is my obligation

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: They inspire me to be a better person!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mom first and foremost; but I'm also a wife and a critical care nurse
